answers.problem_statement: Reusing common workflows and tasks in AI coding assistants, and establishing standard operating procedures for an AI coding assistant
answers.key_goals: Provide a consistent set of standards for projects when using languages I commonly use. Specifically, golang, typescript, and python.
answers.primary_languages: Markdown (primarily), with examples in Go, TypeScript, and Python
answers.frontend_framework: None - these are skills intended to be distributed and used globally or locally within projects
answers.tdd_strictness: Flexible - tests recommended for complex logic
answers.tdd_notes: User noted: I am not sure TDD applies or how to do such a thing for this.
